name: Tiger
description: The tiger is the largest living cat species and a member of the genus Panthera. It is most recognisable for its dark vertical stripes on orange fur with a lighter underside.

name: Beetle
description: Beetles are a group of insects that form the order Coleoptera, characterized by their hard exoskeletons and modified wings.

name: Turtle
description: Turtles are reptiles of the order Testudines, with bodies encased in bony shells. They are known for their longevity.

name: Orangutan
description: Orangutans are great apes native to Indonesia and Malaysia. They are currently found in the rainforests of Borneo and Sumatra.

name: Hornbill
